summary.description:
including capabilities of MODFLOW-OWHM in the FREEWAT GIS modelling environment.

Observation analysis tool for the FREEWAT GIS environment for water resources management.

QGIS plugin or web app? Lessons learned in the development of a 3D georeferencer.

Come along to 's-Hertogenbosch, The Netherlands to find out more about QGIS!.

A Free and Open Source Geographic Information System.

Get the installer or packages for your Operating System!.

summary.name: QGIS
